title: Manager of Digital Marketing and Lead Generation
job_overview:
Are you a tech-savvy, strategic thinker with a passion for digital marketing and lead generation?
Do you thrive in fast-paced, remote environments where your creativity and initiative directly influence business growth? If so, we want to hear from you.

We’re on the lookout for a Remote Executive Marketing Assistant to support our CEO in scaling our marketing and business development efforts. This role blends creativity with strategy and offers the chance to make a tangible impact from day one.

What You’ll Be Doing: 
Email & LinkedIn Campaigns: Own the creation and management of email sequences, newsletters, and LinkedIn outreach to engage and nurture leads.
CRM Management: Use HubSpot (or similar platforms) to track leads, update pipeline stages, and ensure timely follow-ups—no prospect left behind.
Content Repurposing: Turn existing materials into high-impact blog posts, social content, or short-form videos that extend our reach and brand authority.
Market & Industry Research: Conduct research and synthesize insights into actionable reports to inform marketing and outreach strategies.
Performance Reporting: Track campaign results and generate weekly/monthly reports to guide data-driven decision-making.
Event Coordination: Help organize webinars, podcasts, and speaking opportunities to amplify our thought leadership presence.

You Might Be a Great Fit If:
You’ve managed LinkedIn outreach campaigns or are confident navigating HubSpot, Sales Navigator, or similar tools.
You’re self-motivated and organized, with a proactive mindset and strong attention to detail.
You bring experience in B2B marketing, particularly if you've supported C-level executives or small teams.
You’re a strong writer—capable of crafting compelling content across formats (emails, blogs, social posts).
You’re resourceful and love learning new tools or systems that improve efficiency.
You’ve dabbled in basic design (Canva) or video editing—a definite plus.

Company Benefits:
$500 USD Sign-In Bonus if you apply between July 10 to September 25, 2025
Competitive compensation package
Opportunity to work closely with high-level executives from various industries.
Professional growth and development.
Chance to contribute to the success and growth of our clients.
Supportive and collaborative team environment.
Paid US Federal Holidays
Paid Time Off
Healthcare Package
1 Year Travel Bonus
Year-End Bonus

How to Apply:
1. Complete the Form: Start by filling out the form at Upgrade to see actual info.
2. Video Recording: Ensure you have a professional background when recording your video.
3. Be Authentic: We strongly discourage reading from a script. Instead, be genuine and let your personality shine!
4. Email Confirmation: Make sure to provide a valid email address to receive our application confirmation. If you don’t see the confirmation email, double-check for any spelling errors and resubmit the form with the correct email.
5. Next Steps: If your qualifications meet our criteria, our Recruitment Specialist will reach out to you.
